item.title: Flash 8 Source Files - Free for all
item.description: IFBIN is now completely free to anybody and everybody, no subscription fees whatsoever. Which means that all my Flash 8 Source files are now free to download, amongst hundreds of other examples by some of the best developers in our community. Welcome to IFBIN 2.0 open source.
